game_description: # This is a multiplayer game, so to make sure you have a good multiplayer experience, we suggest you to join our Discord:discord.gg/9CTC9Bn7Zf A Little Planet is a Japanese style social game. You can explore beautiful scenes, play multiplayer games, make friends. You will be able to build up your own planet in the future. Features: - Japanese Style Aesthetics: If you like watching anime or manga, you definitely don't want to miss this game! - Party Games: If you are grown up with Mario Party, you might also like the fun and chaos in all the mini games here with a group of fun people laughing together - Multiplayer and More: Of course, this is a multiplayer game, besides the party games, you will also play multiplayer board or chess-like games - Chat with People: Hang out and chat with people in beautiful scenes, or chat around a tea table on fun topics - Customize Your Look: There are different avatars with multiple hair styles, eyes, costumes, you must like them!
review_1: I walked around for an hour looking for a person,then I quit ,there are no people why is this
review_2: Some areas look cute/beautiful but no one is online. A little buggy.
review_3: I would like to specifically talk about the game "Totoro Run". It's just a small game, but it gives you so much fun. In this kind of game you hardly ever get annoyed by others, so the game is pure fun and the atmosphere is very friendly. It doesn't create a toxic community which is hard to avoid as most social games do. I suggest to join their Discord (noted in their game description) to gather people to play together, otherwise you will not get the fun of most mutiplayer contents of the game.
review_4: The graphics are good and looks fun but when I downloaded the game and started it up for some reason it damage my quest 1 data: floor, Guardian, etc. Not sure if it's the latest update for the quest 1 or the app itself. everything was fine till I installed the app.
review_5: Every time I click the game it traps me in a grey void after the Made with Unity splash screen
